item.description:
Let's meet outside in front of the dinosaur at 6:30 and plan to get in whatever sort of line they have at 6:45. No idea how popular this will be, but the theater only holds 330ish people. Please RSVP so I can judge how many people to expect.

The film is I think 45 minutes long, and then we'll fill out a survey. After the film we can grab a drink and/or a bite.

This is my first Nerd Fun meetup, as well as my first time organizing anything for Nerd Fun. It will be great to meet everyone!

DETAILS: The Museum of Science is considering an IMAX film for the Mugar Omni Theater, and
we want your opinion! You are invited to attend a survey screening for Sea Rex: Journey to a Prehistoric World. The screening is free; your only obligation is to complete a short survey at the conclusion of the film. Tickets available in the Museum lobby starting at 7:30 p.m. on the night of the screening (July 27), first come, first served: http://bit.ly/9p6eq0...
item.name: Sea Rex: Journey to a Prehistoric World (Free movie screening at MoS)
